name: Aerosol Can
description: Compact yet powerful, this aerosol can is your instant defense against small fires, delivering quick and effective extinguishing action.

name: 1L Fire Extinguisher
description: Swift and precise, our 1-liter extinguisher reaches far and acts fast, ensuring rapid suppression when every second counts.

name: 2L Fire Extinguisher
description: Extended reach, extended safety. Our 2-liter extinguisher provides a reliable shield with increased discharge time for thorough fire control.

name: 3L Fire Extinguisher
description: Vigorous and efficient, the 3-liter extinguisher covers a wide area with a quick response, making it an essential tool in fire emergencies.

name: 4L Fire Extinguisher
description: Robust and effective, our 4-liter extinguisher delivers a sustained burst of suppression power, conquering flames swiftly and decisively.

name: 5L Fire Extinguisher
description: Unmatched capacity, unmatched performance. The 2.5-gallon extinguisher offers extended duration for comprehensive fire control, ensuring safety in complex situations.

name: Fire Blanket
description: A fire blanket made of non-flammable material, designed to smother small fires in emergencies. Ideal for use in kitchens, homes, and workshops.

name: Water Sprinkler
description: A water sprinkler system designed for efficient irrigation of gardens and lawns. Features adjustable spray patterns and coverage for even watering.
